summary: This document is the Amended and Restated Operating Agreement of LSJE, LLC, a limited liability company formed by Jeffrey E. Epstein in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the company's formation, capital structure, management, and indemnification provisions, establishing Epstein as the sole member and detailing the management authority of Jeanne Brennan.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sole member of LSJE, LLC, and has made a capital contribution to the company.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Brennan is appointed as the initial manager of LSJE, LLC, responsible for managing the company's business and affairs.

connections.description: Epstein, as the sole member of the company, employs Brennan as the manager to oversee the company's operations.

events.title: Amended and Restated Operating Agreement Execution
events.description: The amended operating agreement for LSJE, LLC was executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein, formalizing the company's structure and management.

events.title: Formation of LSJE, LLC
events.description: LSJE, LLC was organized as a limited liability company in the U.S. Virgin Islands.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802
9100 Port of Sale Mall, Suite 15, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802
keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of LSJE, LLC, having contributed $1,000 to the company.
The company was originally named 'LSJ Employees, LLC' before being renamed to 'LSJE, LLC' on March 13, 2013.
Jeanne Brennan is appointed as the initial manager of the company, with specific powers and limitations outlined in the agreement.
The company is structured to allow Epstein to make additional capital contributions and transfer membership units.
The agreement includes provisions for indemnification of the Sole Member and Manager against liabilities incurred in the course of business.
